titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to clarify Federal authority relating to land acquisition from willing sellers for certain trails in the National Trails System.
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to clarify Federal authority relating to land acquisition from willing sellers for certain trails in the National Trails System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-47.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Amends the National Trails System Act to prohibit the Government from acquiring any land or interest in land outside the exterior boundaries of any federally administered area for the North Country, Ice Age, or Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trails without the owner's consent.
